text: The Kosovo War was a controversial war that took place from 1998 to 1999 in the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia. The Kosovo Liberation Army fought the Yugoslavian army from 1998 to 1999. In 1999, NATO bombed Yugoslavia to prevent genocide in Kosovo. ==Related pages== * Yugoslav Wars ==Notes== ==References== Category:History of Kosovo Category:History of Yugoslavia Category:Wars involving Europe Category:Conflicts in 1999 Category:1990s in Europe
title: Kosovo War
